This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

    413495001Normally healthy patient
    413496000Patient with mild systemic disease
    413497009Patient with severe systemic disease, not incapacitating
    413498004Patient with incapacitating systemic disease, constant threat to life
    413499007Moribund patient, < 24-hour life expectancy
